name: TOOTRIS, LLC
description: Developing and providing technology-based solutions for children providers and tutors.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to childcare technology ecosystem such as matching employers, parents, providers and agencies; help shape federal policy on employer sponsored childcare and related tax policy including
H.R.1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act; issues on 45F Tax Credit for Employer-Provided Child Care.
H.R.1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act; issues on 45F Tax Credit for Employer-Provided Child Care; H.R.6312 - Tri-Share Child Care Pilot Act of 2025.
